thread.title: Your Amazon Prime membership now comes with free restaurant delivery in Seattle

author: newsr.in
title: Your Amazon Prime membership now comes with free restaurant delivery in Seattle
text: It’s official: Amazon is breaking into restaurant delivery through its 1-2 hour delivery service Prime Now. Today the company announced that customers in Seattle can order food for delivery from a spate of restaurants including Cactus, Wild Ginger, Skillet, Marination Station, Re:public, Café Yumm!, Ten Mercer, and Mamnoon, through its Prime Now mobile app. The new service promises to deliver […] »
